resources.string: Nexadomus needs WiFi and location permissions to discover and connect to your smart home devices. This allows the app to scan for available WiFi networks.
Some permissions were denied. WiFi and location access are needed for device discovery. The app may not work correctly without these permissions. Please grant the permissions in Settings.
WiFi scanning requires location permissions on Android 12 and below, or nearby devices permissions on Android 13+. These permissions are necessary to discover your Nexadomus device.
